author: Flo
content:
Andreas, since I haven't checked in here for a while, I just finished looking at those images I'd missed. I love the scenes from Croatia and your street level scenes. These latter I think are esp powerful - they lead me into the scene and make me want to know more about what's along the way in the out-of-focus distance.

As for copyright laws, it's sure be nice if the whole world could come together with some sort of unified agreement - and then we'd know where we stand. Only a lawyer may be able to figure out US copyright laws!
